About.title: Custom Speaker Cabinets
About.description1: Transform your audio vision into reality with our precision-engineered custom speaker cabinets. Each enclosure is crafted with exceptional attention to detail, combining acoustic performance with aesthetic excellence.
About.description2: We specialize in producing DIY and OEM speaker enclosures that perfectly match your selected drivers and crossover designs. Using premium materials, advanced woodworking techniques, and acoustic engineering expertise, we ensure structural stability, controlled resonance, and accurate sound reproduction.
About.description3: Whether you're building a Troels Gravesen design or developing your own bespoke speaker system, our craftsmanship and experience provide the perfect foundation for outstanding audio performance. We work with both DIY enthusiasts and OEM manufacturers, delivering perfectly built speaker cabinets tailored to your concept.

customSpeakers.title: Custom Speakers
customSpeakers.description: We create unique audio systems tailored to your needs and preferences, whether it’s for a living room, office, or bedroom. We consider the target environment, your current amplifier, and your sound preferences.

crossoverDesign.title: Crossover Design
crossoverDesign.description: Our experience and knowledge allow us to build crossovers that match your sonic preferences. This is the heart of the system, shaping the character, tone, and overall perception of the sound produced by the speakers.

driverSelection.title: OEM Speakers Cabinets Production
driverSelection.description: We also manufacture OEM speaker enclosures for audio companies around the world. We have experience working with brands from countries such as Switzerland and the USA, ensuring top-tier build quality and on-time delivery.

cncServices.title: CNC Services
cncServices.description: Thanks to our CNC capabilities, we can handle even the most demanding projects, tailoring every detail to your expectations.

Gallery.title: Our Works
Gallery.description: See our custom speaker cabinets in action
Gallery.altec: A modern take on the legendary Altec 816 bass horn, originally used in classic Voice of the Theatre systems. The design was modified with a split, symmetrical bass reflex port and built from 18 mm and 15 mm birch plywood, reinforced internally for maximum rigidity and resonance control. The cabinets were delivered prepped and ready for the client’s own finishing.
Gallery.m1: This time, we present compact bookshelf speakers, developed through a complete process – from 3D design to the finished set. The enclosures, made from 16 mm MDF with a double front panel and reinforced interior, provide excellent rigidity and vibration control. Finished in Midnight Sky lacquer, the speakers impress not only with their appearance but also with their sound – natural, spacious, and precise.
Gallery.ls3: A double project for a single client – compact KEF CS1A speakers and a DIY Rogers AB1 subwoofer, crafted from 12 mm birch plywood and 16 mm MDF. Each enclosure is meticulously detailed according to the design and renders, ensuring perfect proportions and aesthetics. The result is a set with a iconic look and exceptional sound.
Gallery.jaspa: The client had clear expectations – he wanted new speakers that would deliver fuller vocals compared to his Pylon Jasper. Keeping the preferred enclosure shape and familiar drivers, we designed an MTM (midwoofer-tweeter-midwoofer) configuration tailored to his needs. The tweeter’s placement perfectly aligned with ear height on his sofa, confirming the concept’s effectiveness and improved sound.
Gallery.klipsch: Klipsch RF7 mk3 – the client sent the original drivers and requested a faithfully reproduced enclosure in glossy black with a plinth. The final result impresses with flawless lacquer and meticulously crafted details. These powerful speakers make a huge impact in person.

passion.title: Passion
passion.content: Custom speakers – the idea was born from a passion for music and technology. MF Customs is the result of years of dedication to achieving natural and engaging sound, and the desire to deliver a sonic effect in an interesting and unconventional form.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to deliver custom speakers that fill your space with sound that is both true and full of emotion. Beyond the sound itself, there's also visual form – beautiful and unique speaker enclosures. Quality and attention to detail – that’s our motto.

components.title: Components
components.content: In our custom speakers, we use components from market leaders. The drivers come from manufacturers who ensure consistent and repeatable performance as well as the highest build quality. We carefully select models that reproduce music with the highest fidelity – and among them, those that still retain emotion and expression.

quality.title: Quality
quality.content: Our enclosures are entirely handcrafted by us, giving us full control over the production process. We use only the highest quality materials. Thanks to CNC machines, we ensure precision and repeatability in every cut. We always optimize the enclosures in terms of stiffness, standing waves, diffraction on sharp edges, damping, and speaker placement.

Troels_hero.desc: Bring Troels Gravesen’s world-famous designs to life with our precision-crafted speaker enclosures. Built with CNC accuracy, premium materials, and decades of experience, our cabinets unlock the full potential of Jantzen Audio DIY Kits and deliver the authentic sound signature envisioned by Troels.

Troels_texwtwall.desc: Discover the world of high-fidelity audio through precision craftsmanship and acoustic engineering. Each enclosure we build reflects a balance of technology, experience, and passion for music.
Troels_texwtwall.section1: Troels Gravesen is one of the most recognized figures in the DIY audio world. His projects have inspired enthusiasts of outstanding sound for years, combining acoustic precision with musicality. By working with us, you can bring his concepts to life in the form of professionally crafted speaker enclosures.
Troels_texwtwall.section2: The cabinet is the foundation of every loudspeaker system. We use CNC technology, advanced woodworking methods, and proven materials to reproduce design requirements with the highest accuracy. Our enclosures provide structural stability, minimize unwanted resonances, and guarantee the full potential of the drivers.
Troels_texwtwall.section3: Our speaker enclosures are recommended by Jantzen Audio – a renowned manufacturer of DIY Kits. We design cabinets to perfectly match each model, preserving the full acoustic intentions of Troels Gravesen. Even when clients require significant design modifications, we adapt the project to ensure consistency and achieve the highest sound quality.
Troels_texwtwall.section4: Our enclosures not only meet strict acoustic standards but also impress with their appearance. We offer a wide range of finishes – from natural veneers, through high-gloss lacquers, to modern matte surfaces. This way, the speakers become not just a tool for playing music, but also an elegant element of your interior.
Troels_texwtwall.section5: We build enclosures for the most popular Troels Gravesen projects, such as Discovery, Ekta, Ekta Grande, Faital 3WC, The Loudspeaker, ATS, and many others. Each model is crafted according to the author’s specifications to preserve its tonal character and musicality.
Troels_texwtwall.section6: Our enclosures are created for the most demanding clients – both individuals and audio equipment manufacturers. Thanks to years of experience, reliability, and the highest production standards, we are trusted by brands from Switzerland, the USA, and many other countries.
Troels_texwtwall.title6: Experience and Trusted by worldbrand brands

Troels_faq.title: FAQ
Troels_faq.q1: What materials do you use for the cabinets?
Troels_faq.a1: We work with high-quality MDF, birch plywood, and solid wood. Each material is selected for its acoustic properties and durability.
Troels_faq.q2: Can I request custom dimensions or modifications?
Troels_faq.a2: Yes. Even if your project requires significant changes, we adapt the cabinet design while keeping the original acoustic principles intact.
Troels_faq.a3: We provide multiple finishes – natural veneers, matte coatings, and high-gloss lacquers – so the enclosure matches both your sound system and your interior.
Troels_faq.a4: Depending on complexity, standard lead time is 4–8 weeks after pre-payment. Larger or highly customized projects may take longer.
Troels_faq.a5: Yes, we ship worldwide. Our cabinets are safely packed to prevent any transport damage.
Troels_faq.q6: Do you work with audio manufacturers as well as individuals?
Troels_faq.a6: Absolutely. We produce enclosures both for private DIY enthusiasts and for professional audio brands under OEM agreements.
